message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $130. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm aiming for something closer to $125. Would that work for you?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $125, so I'm thinking $122.50. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
